data.name: Case 02: Paranormal Evil
data.detailed_description:
Physical Exorcism Series

This work and the following game(s) are part of the Physical Exorcism Series. You will see some of the same characters across the series, but the stories are independent of each other and can be enjoyed separately.

THE SEQUEL 1 TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1959530/

THE SEQUEL 2 TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2084180/

THE PREQUEL TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1127920/


Recommended by Light of Creators

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389650
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222790
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1229060


About the Game

A survival horror puzzle RPG. Roll your dice to perform checks for elements such as Willpower or Firepower, and save a girl in a hospital full of evil spirits and zombies.

This work and Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator were co-developed by Sounding Stone and MaouCat Studio. These two games share similar gameplay elements but have completely different worlds and stories.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489290/

Features



Dice × Survival Horror × Puzzles
Roll a Willpower, Firepower, or Dexterity check to exorcise an evil spirit, fire at a zombie or avoid danger. Buy weapons to increase the number of dice you can roll — but be aware that your funds are limited.

Strategic Luck Point System
By paying Luck Points (LP), you can increase the value of your dice rolls. LP are limited. Use them wisely!

Characters




"You" (default name: Marty)
A patient who woke up from a coma. You have lost your memory along with all of your family and your only friend.


Sarah "Sally" Sweet
An inpatient in the same hospital as you. She has a very sweet voice.


Bruce "Brucie" Lyne
A member of the exorcist duo Ghosteaters. He follows his own principles.


Jadrienne "Jade" Lee
A member of the Ghosteaters. She is in charge of scouting and support.


Lucia "Lucy" White
The client of the Ghosteaters. She values her friends very much.

data.supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better Display

developers: MaouCat Studio / 魔王貓工作室
